Topic.Title: Silly for GOOG to go down cause of Samsung Loss

Message.Msg: before Apple... there was no personal computer for the masses... before Apple many mp3 players were on the market.... the stunk... the ipod forced others to do better and give you better choices.. before the iphone what was the "smart phone" market like.... the average joe couldn't afford one.... the blackberry didn't care about you the lowly consumer... the iphone put you in a whole new place .... before the ipad.. what kind of tablet computers were outer there?! the iPad made the market place what it is.... you owe everything that you have in technology to Apple in one way or another... and you want to try to paint Apple as this ogre of a company that seeks to stamp out innovation and rip off the consumer... in the history of the Company has that been Apple's M.O.? or has it been a company that has for decades produced product after product that consumers loved and didn't even know they needed such a product until Apple invented it?!! Samsung, Google, Android phone makers, etc..... are making Billions because they stole from Apple.... if you have an android phone you love only because it's really a knock off iphone... if you are cool with that then you are a loser and a thief..... give credit where credit is due... Apple invented it... they stole it and you are benefiting from the theft.... Apple spent billions so they could make Billions... that is business.... they didn't spend billions so Samsung and Google could steal from them and make Billions too!!! get real....

Apple invented that. Google stole it. There are more too. Android is finished.

Topic.Title: Yahoo msg board: feature or bug?

Message.Msg: December 17, 2008 Nokia, Motorola Dominate China's Smartphone Market The two companies hold 90% of the burgeoning market, but Android could play a major role in the next few years. By Marin PerezInformationWeek December 17, 2008 04:45 PM The Chinese market for smartphones is still relatively small, but the growing market is dominated by Nokia and Motorola, according to research firm CCID Consulting. The firm said about 7.5 million smartphones were shipped in the third quarter of 2008, and Nokia grabbed more than 69% of that. Motorola was a distant second with about 20% of the market, and it was followed by HTC's Dopod and Samsung.

Message.Title: Google AdWords scam
Message.Msg: I made a video of the scam CHMR and it details how they used Google AdWords to scam retail investor. The basically purchased a technology for $5,000 and claimed that it would be groundbreaking. They said they have a contract with PEMEX. But yet in the video I made it shows another link to a recording of the head of IR of PEMEX saying they have no contract. So basically this company is a lie. I hope you can help us tell Google about this scam and make it stop. In the video I show how. To find the video type in on YouTube "How to Stop the scam CHMR" Please note that we own shares in GOOG too and love the company and we are not against Google. We just want to make sure they are aware of this scam as we know they would stop it.
